name: three-vr-viewer
author: mflux
description: One-liner to start THREE.js WebVR projects.

scripts.publish: npm run build-js-publish && npm run build-copy
scripts.dev: npm run build-js-dev && npm run build-copy
scripts.build-js-dev: browserify  -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -s VRViewer index.js > three-vr-viewer.js
scripts.build-js-publish: browserify  -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -s VRViewer index.js > three-vr-viewer.js
